Class UIConvertFromDerbyDatabaseDialog

All Implemented Interfaces:
DBProgressListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class UIConvertFromDerbyDatabaseDialog
extends UIDialog
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, DBProgressListener

This dialog allows the user to select a Derby database and convert it to MySQL

Author:
Michelle Bachler

Constructor Detail

UIConvertFromDerbyDatabaseDialog

public UIConvertFromDerbyDatabaseDialog(javax.swing.JFrame parent,
                                        ExternalConnection connection,
                                        java.util.Vector projects)
Constructor. Initializes and draws the contents of this dialog.

Parameters:
parent - the parent frame for this dialog.
projects - the list of current MySQL databse projects.
sMySQLName - the MySQL database username used to access MySQL.
sMySQLPassword - the MySQL database password used to access MySQL.
sMySQLIP - the MySQL database ip address or host name used to access MySQL.
